(8) An award as to title in respect of any nindagama land made by the Board shall, where the decision of the Board on the reference for such award became final and conclusive under section 19 (2), accord with that decision, or where an appeal against that decision was preferred to a District Court, accord with the determination of that Court in such appeal.
